title: Predicting the Best Games, Letdowns, and Dark Horses for Week 3 (Ep. 145)
description:
The Ringer's Kevin Clark and Robert Mays preview the four most intriguing matchups in Week 3 (04:00) and discuss the future of international games in the NFL (21:00). Michael Lombardi joins the show to examine the Texans going into New England (29:30) and Dallas playing the Cardinals (36:00). Then Danny Kelly calls in to give out some fantasy football dark horses (45:00). Finally, Kevin and Mays wrap up by predicting next week's NFL headlines (57:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
